de.ovgu.featureide.featurehouse.errorpropagation

Class ErrorPropagation

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.ovgu.featureide.featurehouse.errorpropagation.ErrorPropagation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CErrorPropagation, JavaErrorPropagation

    public abstract class ErrorPropagation
extends java.lang.Object
    Propagates error markers for composed files to sources files.
    Author:
    Jens Meinicke, Sebastian Krieter

    • Method Detail

      • createErrorPropagation

        public static ErrorPropagation createErrorPropagation(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile sourceFile)
        Propagates error markers for composed files to sources files.
        Call addFile(IFile) to propagate the markers of the given source file, to the corresponding file at the features folder.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - initial source file for determine project and language.
        (must still be added by calling addFile(IFile))
        Returns:
        return ErrorPropagation

      • addFile

        public void addFile(org.eclipse.core.resources.IFile sourceFile)
        Propagates the markers of the given source file, to the corresponding file at the features folder.
        Parameters:
        sourceFile - The composed file
